original_title: Sri Lanka bonds open down, rupee 320.00/321.50 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds opened unchanged at close, dealers said while the spot US dollar opened at 320.00/321.50 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted down at 15.25/35 percent after closing at 15.30/60.00 percent on Friday.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 was quoted down at 15.25/35 percent after closing at 15.30/60.00 percent on Friday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted down at 13.80/14.20 percent after closing at 15.15/15.75 percent on Friday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 and 01.07.2025 have not been quoted. (Colombo/July14/2023)
